title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS European Sovereign Cloud: Your 20-Minute Essential Guide (GBL101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS欧洲主权云：20分钟核心指南 (GBL101)
abstract: Discover AWS's European Sovereign Cloud, designed to meet the evolving data sovereignty requirements and regulatory landscape of the European Union. In this concise 20-minute session, we'll explore the key features, architectural principles, and unique value propositions of this purpose-built cloud solution. Learn how AWS addresses data residency, operational autonomy, and compliance requirements while maintaining the same level of security, reliability, and innovation you expect from AWS. Whether you're a business leader, architect, or compliance professional operating in Europe, this session will equip you with essential knowledge to navigate the future of sovereign cloud computing.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS欧洲主权云，该解决方案旨在满足欧盟不断演变的数据主权要求和监管环境。在这个简洁的20分钟会议中，我们将探讨这一专门构建的云解决方案的关键特性、架构原则和独特价值主张。了解AWS如何在保持您期望的AWS安全性、可靠性和创新水平的同时，满足数据驻留、运营自主权和合规性要求。无论您是在欧洲运营的业务领导者、架构师还是合规专业人员，本次会议都将为您提供必要的知识，以应对主权云计算的未来。
